name: Shannon F.
title: Ephphatha Counseling
feedback: AMAZING and talented Web Designer! I could not have asked for a more professional, and timely communicator with such a creative eye.  Her professional inquiry to grasp my ideas and vision for my website was stellar. Her attention to detail and requests made all the difference. I loved her step by step process because I never felt overwhelmed. I am super happy with my product and highly recommend her.
